metadata.Title: CVE-2021-28091 on Ubuntu 18.04 FIPS Compliant (bionic) - medium
metadata.Description:
Lasso all versions prior to 2.7.0 has improper verification of acryptographic signature.

    Update Instructions:

    Run `sudo pro fix CVE-2021-28091` to fix the vulnerability. The problem can be corrected
    by updating your system to the following package versions:

liblasso-perl - 2.5.1-0ubuntu1.2
liblasso3 - 2.5.1-0ubuntu1.2
python-lasso - 2.5.1-0ubuntu1.2
python3-lasso - 2.5.1-0ubuntu1.2
No subscription required

criterions.comment: lasso package in bionic was vulnerable but has been fixed (note: '2.5.1-0ubuntu1.2').
